name: Combine and Conquer (itch)
description:
Combine and Conquer is a game about expanding to grow in power, to be able to defeat waves of oncoming enemies. As you increase in power, you will also increase in size, giving you more areas to be hit by enemies.

You use WASD/Arrow Keys to move, and Mouse to build onto yourself.

Combine and Conquer was made for the 2021 GMTK GameJam.
